name: Code Generation
description: Best practices for generating code and using code interpreter MCPs with Lollms.
content:
# LoLLMs Code Generation

You can use the client to generate code. For advanced use cases, use an Agentic workflow (Personality) with a code interpreter MCP.

## Example

```python
from lollms_client import LollmsClient

lc = LollmsClient()

code = lc.generate_text(
    prompt="Write a python function to calculate the fibonacci sequence.",
    n_predict=512
)
# Use the result to build or execute scripts via MCP tools
```
